title: Bhagat Singh
selftext:
Happy Independence Day to all and in the spirt of celebrating Azadi ka Amrit Mahotsav I made a video regarding Bhagat Singh and how his true ideology has often been supressed which in this day and age would give him the label - ANTI-NATIONAL. 

https://youtu.be/wnzoI0FKTOo

Please do watch , feedback is appreciated! Thank You!
